categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Alyos Sek-Shele was a Jedi Master who served the Jedi Order during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. Around 3643 BBY, Sek-Shele was conducting biological research on the planet Herdessa when the Jedi was infected with a plague by the Sith Lord Vivicar. However, Sek-Shele was freed when Vivicar was defeated.

Alyos Sek-Shele was first mentioned in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, in a message to Jedi Consular players after end of Act I if they chose to allow Terrak Morrhage to kill the Jedi Masters connected to him.
